description: Row sums of signed triangle A062138 (generalized a=5 Laguerre).
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,100
Index entries for sequences related to Laguerre polynomials
prog: (PARI) { f=1; for (n=0, 100, if (n>1, f*=n); a=f*binomial(n+5, n); g=1; a+=sum(m=1, n, ((-1)^m)*f*binomial(n+5, n-m)/g*=m); write("b062191.txt", n, " ", a) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 02 2009]
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jun 19 2001
extensions: Typo in first formula corrected by _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Feb 25 2014
